name: Bouncy (Obvious_San)
description:
This is a super rough and early alpha version of a local multiplayer game called 'Bouncy'. There are no ingame instructions or even a main menu.
To play the game you need to have two controllers connected to your pc. A player logs in by pressing any controller button. 

Controlls:

Moving - Left Analog Stick

Stomp Down - Right Trigger

Hover - Left Trigger

Jump - South Face Button

Dash - Right Face Button

If you want to know more about the project, please watch the devlog:
